metadata.feature_description: Main connector interface for configuring Google Analytics tracking settings including tracking ID, domain, and admin tracking preferences.

steps.action: Navigate to Settings > Connectors > Google Analytics 4
steps.expected: Google Analytics connector configuration panel opens
steps.actual: Configuration panel opened with Measurement ID field and Track for Administrators checkbox

steps.action: Enter UA-12345678-1 in the Measurement ID field
Enter G-ABCDEF1234 in the Measurement ID field

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Validate tracking ID format - Invalid format acceptance

steps.expected: System validates and rejects invalid format OR accepts any value
steps.actual: System accepted the invalid tracking ID without validation error
Success message displayed - system does not validate tracking ID format

issues: No client-side or server-side validation for tracking ID format. System accepts any non-empty string as a valid tracking ID.

steps.action: Enter valid GA4 tracking ID and click Save
steps.actual: Configuration saved successfully, 'Item successfully saved.' message displayed

steps.action: Clear the Measurement ID field completely
Click Save button with empty field
steps.actual: Error message displayed: 'Tracking Code Cannot Be Empty'
Success message 'Item successfully deleted.' displayed, connector now shows 'Connect' button instead of 'Edit'

steps.expected: Connector shows 'Connect' button when no configuration exists
steps.actual: Connector displays 'Connect' button and no green checkmark

steps.action: Click Connect to start new configuration
steps.actual: Fresh configuration form displayed with empty Measurement ID field and unchecked Track for Administrators

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edge case - Special characters / XSS attempt

steps.action: Enter script tags '<script>alert('XSS')</script>' as tracking ID
steps.actual: Input accepted and saved without execution - displayed as text
Value saved successfully, displayed as escaped text in the form

issues: System accepts special characters including script tags. While the value is displayed as text (not executed), there is no input validation to reject potentially malicious content at entry time.

steps.action: Enter very long tracking ID (270+ characters)
steps.expected: Input accepted or truncated/rejected based on field limits
steps.actual: Long input accepted without validation or truncation
Value saved successfully without length validation

issues: No maximum length validation for tracking ID field. Very long inputs are accepted.

steps.action: Toggle Track for Administrators checkbox to checked
steps.actual: Checkbox successfully toggled to checked state

steps.expected: Configuration saved with admin tracking enabled

observations: The connector is labeled 'Google Analytics 4' in the UI but accepts both GA4 (G-XXXXX) and Universal Analytics (UA-XXXXX) tracking IDs

Code review shows a warning message should appear for UA- prefix tracking IDs about Universal Analytics deprecation, but this warning was not visible in the main connector form (may only appear in advanced settings dialog)
No format validation exists for tracking ID - system accepts any non-empty string including invalid formats, special characters, and very long strings
The Track for Administrators checkbox defaults to unchecked for new configurations
Delete Connection button only appears after a configuration has been saved (not on new/empty configurations)
Advanced Settings link exists in the UI template (connector.htm) but was not prominently visible in the tested interface
